name: Kranks
description:
At Kranks, they're always watching.

Kranks is a game that I have been working on for the past 3 months, and it is now finally finished.

DISCLAIMER - Kranks is very inspired by the Five Nights At Freddy's franchise, however it does not associate with Kranks in any way.

Note that Kranks does not have a save feature, the game play time is around 1 hour to complete.
